import { useContext } from "react" import { optionsApi } from "../utils/optionsApi" import Api from "../utils/Api" import Card from "./Card" function Main(props) { const { onEditProfile, onAddPlace, onEditAvatar, onCardClick, cards, onCardLike, onCardDelete } = props function handleEditAvatarClick() { const popupAvatar = document.querySelector('.popup_apdate-avatar'); console.log(popupAvatar) popupAvatar.classList.add('popup_opened'); } function handleEditProfileClick() { const popupEditProfile = document.querySelector('.popup_edit-form'); console.log(popupEditProfile) popupEditProfile.classList.add('popup_opened'); } function handleAddPlaceClick() { const popupAddPlace = document.querySelector('.popup_add-form'); console.log(popupAddPlace) popupAddPlace.classList.add('popup_opened'); } return (
